mapper.select: SELECT ps.score_id AS scoreId, ps.user_id AS userId, u.username AS username, ps.game_date AS gameDate, ps.score AS score, ps.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM poker_scores ps JOIN users u ON ps.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY ps.user_id ASC, ps.game_date ASC

SELECT ps.score_id AS scoreId, ps.user_id AS userId, u.username AS username, ps.game_date AS gameDate, ps.score AS score, ps.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM poker_scores ps JOIN users u ON ps.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ps.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ps.game_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO poker_scores (user_id, game_date, score) VALUES (#{userId}, #{gameDate}, #{score})
